name: CSONGRAD COUNTY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY - ENTERPRISE EUROPE NETWORK OFFICE
memberOrga:
Our chamber has 1092 members. They are enterprises mainly from Csongrad county. The list of our members is not public. 
The members of our presidency: http://csmkik.hu/kamarai-osztalyok/
goal:
The Chamber of Commerce and Industry Csongrád County has nearly 1800 members from the fields of trade, industry, service and crafts.

The role of the chambers is to help their members, the actors of the business sphere, through the improvement of entrepreneurial environment, economic analyses and forecasts, the coordination of vocational training, suggestions, building credible, authentic business relationships and providing consultation in legal, taxation and other matters.

The Chamber of Commerce and Industry hosts the office of the Enterprise Europe Network, the member of the only network of the European Commission established for supporting small and medium sized enterprises.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
SME related initiatives:

Single Market, taxation, GDPR, Small Business Act etc.
